Sayaji Hotels Property Location:  With a stay at Sayaji Hotel in Indore, you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Brilliant Convention Centre and Khajrana Ganesh Temple.  This 5-star hotel is 2.8 mi (4.5 km) from Holkar Stadium and 3.2 mi (5.1 km) from Indore White Church.Rooms:  Make yourself at home in one of the 214 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your memory foam bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries.Amenities:  Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a nightclub, a health club, and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room.Dining:  Enjoy Mediterranean cuisine at Mediterra, one of the hotel's 7 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM.Business, Other Amenities:  Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite.

hotel_name: Chokhi Dhani Indore - An Ethnic Village Resort
hotel_info:
Chokhi Dhani Indore - An Ethnic Village ResortSet in sprawling acres of land, Choki Dhani Resort sport a traditional Rajasthani decor and is fully equipped with cottages for a relax stay. The warmth of the ambience and the ethnic Rajasthani cuisine makes one feel at the land of the desert, Rajasthan. Location: Choki Dhani is located at Khandwa road, Datodasata. The nearby places of attraction for the guests are Sai Baba Mandir (approx. 10km) and Lord Ganesh temple (approx. 10km). The other interesting places worth a look are Rajwada, Lal Bagh Palace and Geeta Bhawan.Distance from Devi Ahilyabai Holkar International Airport: Approx. 25kmsDistance from Indore Junction Railway Station: Approx. 19kmsHotel Features: Choki Dhani provides an easy stay with an array of delightful facilities. The most highlighting feature of this hotel is 'Sanjha Chulha', a Punjabi Dhaba which also serves other North Indian cuisine. 'Bindola', a multi- cuisine Fine restaurant with its contemporary decor and inviting ambience is surely an astronomers delight. Business services and conference suite ensures a smooth flow during corporate events and seminars. The basic amenities include room service, 24-hour front desk and 24-hour security. Rooms: The guests have to choose from a variety of rooms in the hotels, such as royal cottage and royal suites. The cottages in the resort are adorned with ethnic decor and provide great comfort to the guests. The interior decor of the room features traditional furnitures, a writing desk, air conditioning, colour television, minibar, telephone and tea/ coffee maker.

Hotel Winway Hotel Winway, Indore, with its contemporary interiors, amicable hospitality and attentive services invites leisure as well business travellers. Offering of business and basic amenities coupled with spacious, well-facilitated accommodations and also easy accessibility to the railway station of the City ensures a pleasant stay.Location:Hotel Winway is situated at RNT Marg, opposite Chetak Centre. This hotel enjoys proximity to tourist hotspots like Indore Museum (Approx. 3km) and Kanch Mandir (Approx. 3km). Kanch Mandir is a 20th century Jain temple made of glass and mirrors. The temple features a black onyx idol of Lord Mahavira, delicately crafted Chinese lantern-type glass lamps and cut glass chandelier. Patrons can also plan a trip to other beautiful sight-seeing attractions in the city like Ganesh Temple, Meghdoot Upvan and Annapurna temple.Devi Ahilyabai Holkar Airport: 9 km (approx.)Indore Junction Railway Station: 1 km (approx.)Hotel Features:Hotel Winway provides necessary amenities so that guests can work and rest comfortably.The essential facilities provided to the patrons are room service, internet, 24-hour front desk, air conditioning and 24-hour security. Corporate travellers can smoothly conduct their meetings, seminars or other official events with the help of business centre offered by the hotel. Tasty meals can be savoured at the in-house restaurant. There is also an in-house coffee shop that makes for a perfect place to unwind with family and friends.Rooms:Accommodation is offered in the form of standard and deluxe rooms at Hotel Winway. These rooms are elegantly furnished with a well-organised decor. Each room is equipped with essential amenities for guests convenience.

hotel_name: Hotel Shri Nivas (Near Navlakha Bus stand)
hotel_info:
Hotel Shri Nivas (Near Navlakha Bus stand), IndoreHotel Shri Nivas is one of the best 2-star hotels in Indore. Facilities at the hotel include spacious rooms and in-room amenities like air-conditioning, flat-screen television and attached bathroom. Complimentary WiFi and room service are some of the other facilities in this hotel. Raja Bhoj Airport, Airport Rd, Gandhi Nagar, Bhopal is 190 km away from this property. Being in proximity to the main transport points, there are many restaurants around the hotel where guests can choose to dine.Situated 4 km from Sarafa Bazar, Treasure Island mall, shopping in Indore can be an interesting experience with a number of shops and malls which include Central mall and C21 mall. Besides, Sitlamata bazar, MT Cloth market, Khajuri market, Sarafa bazaar, Heritage market, Kothari market, Topkhana market, Moolchand market and Tibet market are hotspots to shop, apparel, desserts, handicrafts and artefacts make up for good souvenirs.Amongst the must-visit places in Indore include Rajwada, Kanch Mandir Tiraha, Pipliyapala Regional Park, Lal Bagh Palace, Khajrana Ganesh Mandir, Bada Ganpati, Gommatagiri Digambar Jain Temple, ISKCON Radha Krishna Mandir, Vaishno Devi Temple and Annapurna Temple. Other tourist attractions accessible from Indore include Ralamandal Wildlife Sanctuary, Patalpani Waterfall, Omkareshwar, The Ved Shala Ujjain, Narmada Ghat Maheshwar, Tincha Water Falls, Jahaz Mahal Mandu, Mahakaleshwar temple Ujjain, Hoshang Shahs Tomb and Bahadur Mahal, Mandu  where a trip to these places provides valuable insights into the Indian history of kings and communities. Tourists flock here throughout the year but the best time to visit Indore is between October to March for favourable weather conditions.
